description: A 30-year-old man has been charged with murder and a further 32-year-old man arrested, police say.
title: Murder charge after man, 37, found dead at home
title_page: Wrexham: Murder charge after man, 37, found dead at home - BBC News
maintext:
A 30-year-old man has been charged with murder after a man was found dead at his home.
Police were called to an address on the Gwynant estate in Acrefair, Wrexham, at about 12:30 GMT on Sunday, responding to concerns for a resident.
Paramedics pronounced a 37-year-old man dead at the scene.
North Wales Police has charged a man from the city's Plas Madoc area with murder and he will appear at Wrexham Magistrates' Court on Thursday.
